ecological_assessment.qualitative_description: The model captures most NPZ model characteristics, but with some significant deviations from the standard NPZ equation structure

nutrient_equation_uptake.explanation: Partially matches Michaelis-Menten kinetics (N/(K_N+N)), but lacks self-shading term. Uses light limitation instead of explicit self-shading.

nutrient_equation_recycling.explanation: Includes nutrient recycling through mortality and grazing, but lacks explicit excretion term. Recycling mechanism is simplified compared to standard NPZ model.

nutrient_equation_mixing.explanation: No explicit environmental mixing term (k*(N0-N)) is present in the model

phytoplankton_equation_growth.explanation: Captures nutrient-limited growth with Michaelis-Menten kinetics, but includes additional light limitation factor

phytoplankton_equation_loss.explanation: Includes mortality and predation loss terms, closely matching standard NPZ structure

zooplankton_equation.explanation: Very close match to standard NPZ zooplankton equation, with growth through predation and mortality terms
